law.text: The group life policy shall contain a provision that the insurer will issue to the policyholder, for delivery to each person insured an individual certificate, setting forth a statement as to the insurance protection to which he is entitled to whom the insurance benefits are payable and the rights and conditions set forth in KRS 304.16-190 to 304.16-210, inclusive.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 16, sec. 18, effective June 18, 1970.
